headline.main: PSA CEO: Vauxhall Plants an Opportunity if There Is Hard Brexit
headline.print_headline: PSA CEO: Vauxhall Plants an Opportunity if There Is Hard Brexit

lead_paragraph: PSA Group's Chief Executive Carlos Tavares said Vauxhall's factories are an asset for the French carmaker if Britain exits the European common market in a so-called "Hard Brexit" scenario.
snippet: PSA Group's Chief Executive Carlos Tavares said Vauxhall's factories are an asset for the French carmaker if Britain exits the European common market in a so-called "Hard Brexit" scenario....
